Portfolio

I’m available for web and interface design, or front-end development. Other than client work, I also work on some personal projects. If you’d like to look at code I've written, take a look at my GitHub profile.

Clinton Foundation

I helped the Clinton Foundation—together with the help of Crush + Lovely—to create a mobile Safari app for their visit to Africa.

Homewoods on the Willamette

Homewoods on the Willamette is a beautiful retirement community located just outside Portland.

Drupalize.Me

Learn Drupal from the experts where you get over 231 hours of Drupal training. You can see these videos from anywhere with our apps for iOS, Android and Roku.

Webform

Webform is a form and survey service built on Drupal and the Webform module by Nate Haug.
